pullrequest.title: Fix linking of opende with HAVE_BULLET

content.raw: This is similar to the treatment of DART on the lines just below, but can you provide a little more information about how you observed the linking error (compiler, operating system, where/how dependencies are installed)? I'm curious why we haven't observed this issue before now.
content.html: This is similar to the treatment of DART on the lines just below, but can you provide a little more information about how you observed the linking error (compiler, operating system, where/how dependencies are installed)? I'm curious why we haven't observed this issue before now.
